name: Ogrim and Bogrim
description:
A coop tower defence game with resource mining and management.

Hordes of lizard mutations try to storm your home base while working on the ultimate weapon of your destruction.

Play together as two dwarves. Defend your home base, mine resources to build towers with, upgrade them or level yourself up. Either let the towers fight for you or throw yourself into battle with your hammer.

But watch out: Time is ticking! In 10 minutes, the opponents will have completed their ultimate weapon. Reach the enemies' home base before time runs out and destroy the mine truck full of explosives before they blow it up into your home base. If your home base is lost, the game is over.

Join the other player by code via the main menu. One hosts, the other joins.

Make them stop!

Controls:

WASD: Run
Mouse: Camera
Mouse wheel: Switch between hammer and pickaxe
B: Build (depending on whether hammer or pickaxe is equipped) => only the host is able to build
RMB: Place a tower

Important:

Top right Inventory: Shared inventory available from anywhere.
Bottom left inventory: Individual inventory => cannot be used, must first be brought to the box in the HomeBase.
Blacksmith in HomeBase: Upgrade the player's Health & Attack
Nexus in HomeBase: Must be defended. Player respawns there after death. Health regeneration possible
Blue crystals/gold: Currency to buy; must be mined with pickaxe.
Green crystals: Block passages. Must be destroyed with pickaxe
Enemies: Must be attacked with a hammer
